body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Human player has 2 life, Computer has 4 life
2. Play Earhquake with X=8 What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected: the game ends as a draw, as both players have negative life.
Actual: human player is declared to have lost. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.39 on Windows 7

If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. 

LOG (P): Tap Mountain. Tap Mountain. Tap Mountain. Tap Mountain. Tap Mountain. Tap Mountain. Tap Mountain. Tap Mountain. Tap Mountain. Pay {X}{R} (X is 8). Play Earthquake.
LOG (P): {L} Igor lost the game.
LOG (P): Earthquake deals 8 damage to each creature without flying and each player.
author: [i...@tandetnik.org](https://code.google.com/u/100964988663965718405/)
title: Killing both players simultaneously doesn't register as a draw

comments.body:
For simplicity in creating the AI, Magarena has no draws. Player with lowest life less than 0 is the loser. The lowest life part was accidentally removed earlier, that will be fixed.

**Status:** Accepted
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
